item.title: 1.1. The Tools of Microeconomics
item.description: Contents Overview Slides Preliminary Survey Overview An introduction to the course and the tools we use in microeconomics. Slides Lecture Slides Preliminary Survey Please take the /assignment/preliminary-survey on your math background. This will help us all have a productive course together.
